thread.title: Our Top Cooking Gift Ideas (That Aren't Equipment) | America's Test Kitchen
thread.title_full: Our Top Cooking Gift Ideas (That Aren't Equipment) | America's Test Kitchen

author: America's Test Kitchen
title: Our Top Cooking Gift Ideas (That Aren't Equipment) | America's Test Kitchen
text:
The holidays are the perfect time to give the gift of great cooking. Whether you’re shopping for a seasoned home chef, someone just learning their way around the kitchen, or a food lover who wants to learn from the best, America’s Test Kitchen has something special.
1-Year Subscription to Cook’s Illustrated Magazine
With a print subscription to Cook’s Illustrated, you will receive our test cooks' kitchen science discoveries, no-nonsense product reviews, and new techniques that save time and effort when it matters.
Our Favorite Cookbooks
Your friends and family will be delighted to unwrap our top-rated cookbooks filled with delicious and reliable recipes.
Give the Gift of a Special Event with the ATK Cast
Step behind the scenes of America’s Test Kitchen for an unforgettable culinary adventure based in our Boston headquarters at our Inside the Studio: A Taste of ATK event. We’re offering our members, subscribers, and most-loyal fans the exclusive chance to visit our studios, meet their favorite cast members, and experience the magic of ATK up close.
Tickets to ATK + PBS 2025 Tour with Julia and Bridget
Treat the food lover in your life to an unforgettable evening with ATK’s beloved hosts, Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster. This live tour brings cooking, laughter, and behind-the-scenes stories to the stage. Check out all the tour dates and locations so that you can buy tickets while they last.
Looking for other holiday gift ideas? Check out our top kitchen gear, tested and handpicked by the ATK Reviews team!
